column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Get the steak. I say this because we were swayed by all these phenomenal reviews of non-steak things
column2: and were honestly disappointed. The baked goat cheese was fine
column3: but overpriced for what was basically marinara and Texas toast. The bacon had great flavor but bordered on undercooked for me. The prime rib sandwich was a bit bland and a little disappointing.
